alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 6:30PM EDT until August 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Columbia County in northern Florida... Northeastern Suwannee County in northern Florida... Southeastern Hamilton County in northern Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 630 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jasper to near Suwannee Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Live Oak, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Wellborn, Suwannee Valley, Mcalpin, and Houston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
